topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d6d7d06368722e06410400#post_54d6d7d06368722e06410400
Malay.

In my opinion, Malay is kinda like the opposite of English. Every English word has a Malay variant of it. In terms of grammar, Malay is usually placed upside down compared to English.
